snippet.title: The Trip Adventure (Free Game for iOS / Android)
snippet.description:
The Trip Adventure Trailer (Free Game for iOS / Android)

Join this exciting journey in search for answers. Because life is a journey with joys, shortcuts and unexpected incidents.

On board a hot air balloon you must reach as far as possible, in an endless game where your ability to concentrate and your visual abilities will be challenged.

A simple indie game, controlled with a touch of screen. Ideal for moments of relaxation, travel by train, metro or plane. Perfect to enjoy the music and the incredible landscapes.

I'm Iskiam Jara and this is my first game made with love in Barcelona. 
I look forward to reading your comments to improve the game.

Thanks for playing.

iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/the-trip-adventure/id1279230541?l=es&ls=1&mt=8

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.iskiamjara.thetrip



Music: 
At Rest - Romance de Kevin MacLeod está sujeta a una licencia de Creative Commons Attribution (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
Fuente: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?isrc=USUAN1100748
Artista: http://incompetech.com/
